abstract: Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, no longer has to look very far for parental advice. His father is joining the bank’s securities business.
snippet: Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, no longer has to look very far for parental advice. His father is joining the bank’s securities business.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Dimon, chief executive of JPMorgan Chase, no longer has to look very far for parental advice. His father is joining the bank’s securities business.

headline.main: Like Son, Like Father, at JPMorgan Chase
